item.title: Icons
item.dc:creator: christos
item.content:encoded:
[section title="Examples"] [row] [span4]

  One font, 249 icons

In a single collection, Font Awesome is a pictographic language of web-related actions. [/span4] [span4]

  CSS control

Easily style icon color, size, shadow, and anything that's possible with CSS. [/span4] [span4]

  Infinite scalability

Scalable vector graphics means every icon looks awesome at any size. [/span4] [/row]
[row] [span4]

  Free as a beer

Font Awesome is completely free for commercial use. Check out the license [/span4] [span4]

  IE7 support

Font Awesome supports IE7. If you need it, you have my condolences. [/span4] [span4]

  Perfect on retina displays

Font Awesome icons are vectors, which mean they're gorgeous on high-resolution displays. [/span4] [/row]
[row] [span4]

  Made for twitter bootstrap

Designed from scratch to be fully compatible with Twitter Bootstrap 2.2.2. [/span4] [span4]

  Designer friendly

Install FontAwesome.otf and visit the copy & paste page. Happy designing. [/span4] [span4]

  Screen reader compatible

Font Awesome won't trip up screen readers, unlike other icon fonts. [/span4] [/row] [/section] [section title="icons" style="gray"]

item.title: Contact form 1
item.dc:creator: harconst
item.content:encoded:
[text your-name class:span12 watermark "your name"]
[email* your-email class:span12 watermark "your email"]
[text your-subject class:span12 watermark "subject"]
[textarea* your-message x5 class:span12 watermark "I want to talk about....."]
